posts.post_title: Heads up this guy tried to scam me to sell a Cobb   +1 (609) 301-0320
posts.post_content:
Heads up this guy tried to scam me to sell a Cobb 

+1 (609) 301-0320

Doesn’t have the card. Asked for pic with name and number and he sent pic of his name and number beside the computer monitor with pic of card

I got a suspicious PM from him as well.

Sent from my SM-G781V using Tapatalk
I sent Leon his PM to me. He just sent me pics of an E94 Speaker that he pulled off eBay. He is a scammer.

So far everything I have seen people saying is that this guy is a scammer. But I haven't seen hard evidence. Did I miss it?
 BTW, I just now deleted another account but don't think it is who is being talked about here. 
.
Hi Leon - gengmega is the seller. Profile created on 12/31/21.
